nodes.bodyText: Is this a completely empty rule? We can delete it completely.
Is this a completely empty rule? If so we can delete it.

@wyu12, here is another colour that could be updated with a variable. @profmikegreene mentioned using "text-color-3" (not the exact name) or the disabled text variable. You'll have to see where this is used and therefore, what the appropriate colour is. Thanks.

There's still a good amount of color, border-color, and background hardcoded in this file, please update all the values in the file to CSS Custom Props. If you can't reproduce the markup for more than a couple of them, it might be best to move onto another file and reassign this one to me or Shawn.
